name: Short Fuse: The Short Stick
description:
There are many facets to the Short Fuse Factory. It's what makes the bomb tick, if you will. In this adventure, it's your job to determine who is crucial to the extended success of the Short Fuse Factory. And if no one is crucial? Well I'm sure an AI can replace them. No problem! Right?

--- How To Play ---

Pick up a file from the Fax Machine and determine what the best course of action is.

Change camera views with the scroll wheel.

When the form is fully filled out, click in the signature area to sign.
